			 **** KENNY AND THE EVIL BLOB ****

			BY THE MAGNIFICENT *** KENNY WON ***

STORY:
OK DUDE, YOU'RE THIS GUY NAMED KENNY. THEN YOU FIND THE PRINCESS IS
MISSING. THE ONLY REASON WHY WOULD BE THE BLOB. THE BLOB IS THE
VILLIAN OF WONG CITY. SO NOW YOU HAVE TO RESCUE HER BACK. IN ORDER
TO DO THAT, YOU HAVE TO RESCUE THE SERVANTS OF WONG CASTLE. THEN YOU
HAVE TO FIND THE SWORD OF WONG AND KILL THE BLOB WITH IT. HAVE FUN!

DIRECTIONS:
STEP 1:	FIND THE SERVANTS
STEP 2:	EXIT LEVEL FROM STAIRS
STEP 3:	FIND THE SWORD
STEP 4:	COMFRONT THE BLOB
STEP 5:	YOU WIN! YAY!

CONTROLS:
UP:	MOVE UP
DOWN:	MOVE DOWN
LEFT:	MOVE LEFT
RIGHT:	MOVE RIGHT

LAST REMARKS:
HAVE FUN!

CHEATS:
FIGURE OUT THE LEVELS TO THE GAME-
